@tescomobileire saying SIM locked. She enters correct SIM PIN, gets access but unable to connect to internet using cellular coverage.
@tescomobileire thanks. About 2 yrs. Look like bye phone has cellular coverage but can't connect to anything. After restarts she's prompted
@tescomobileire Any idea what the problem may be and how to fix it? Started today on a phone she's had for a good while
@tescomobileire Hi, wife can get no cellular coverage on her phone, & SIM is locked after restarts. Entering the correct sim PIN as well
